snippet: HARRINGTON--John J.,Ph.D., on March 6, 2016. He was the beloved husband of Ellen (nee Witter), loving father of William and Matthew, grandfather of Liam, dear brother of Rev. Donald J. C.M., and Jay. Funeral services by Chapman Cole and Gleason, West Falmouth, MA. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Bourne Food Pantry, P.O. Box 144, Buzzards Bay, MA 02532. For online guestbook, obituary and directions, visit: ccgfuneralhome.com. 1/3
